title: Headlight - Adjustment

body.body: Warning - Headlights - Do not adjust headlight when moving
Never attempt to adjust a headlight beam when the motorcycle is in motion.
Any attempt to adjust a headlight beam when the motorcycle is in motion may result in loss of control and an accident.
The headlight can be adjusted by the vertical adjustment screw located on the rear of the headlight.
Switch the headlight dipped beam on.
Turn the vertical (UP - DOWN) adjustment screw on the headlight clockwise to raise the beam or anti-clockwise to lower the beam.
Switch the headlights off when the beam settings are satisfactory.
